name: Tower Of Terror minigame
description:
Hey, welcome to my very FIRST EVER COMPLETE GAME THAT I UPLOADED ANYWHERE. I made this on construct 3 in my spare time during programing class, and I wanted to share it. It was originally made for phones, until I found out that costs money, which I don't have. Don't feel obligated to donate, though I don't discourage such. I heavily encourage comments, especially constructive criticism, any if other game developers see this, I hope to be like you one day.

Controls- click the mouse or hit the space bar to jump, should also support controllers, I haven't tested that part yet.

BTW- the music was composed on ear sketch by me

Business Email - TheBamLord01@gmail.com
